column1: Smoque BBQ////You place your order at the counter
column3: and are given a number. We ordered from a bored young girl who couldn't have looked more unhappy to be there. Within mere minutes
column4: your number is yelled out for you to walk back up to pick up your tray. Okay
column6: your food can be made-to-order within minutes
column7: but BBQ? No. So the food is not made-to-order. You can BYOB or serve yourself at a soda station
column10: a deli or McDonald's or Burger King.
